name: Buku Guru
description:
Bahasa Indonesia
Mainkan game petualangan nya ini dengan cara tekan tombol arah di keyboard :
- Arah Kiri untuk gerakkan karakter ke kiri
- Arah Kanan untuk gerakkan karakter ke kanan
- Arah Atas untuk gerakkan karakter loncat ke atas
Kumpulkan buku sebanyak-banyaknya dan injak musuh untuk berpetualang sampai ke depan gerbang sekolah dan jangan sampai terlambat datang di sekolah karena terdapat waktu mundur, serta raihlah score sebanyak-banyak nya dan selamat bermain!

English 

Play this adventure game by pressing the direction keys on the keyboard:
- Left direction to move the character to the left
- Right Direction to move the character to the right
- Up Direction to move the character jump up
Collect as many books as possible and step on the enemy for an adventure to the front of the school gate and don't be late for school because there is time to retreat, and get as many scores as possible and have fun playing!

Game Developer
Yehova Tjioe
SMK Negeri 9 Malang
https://smkn9malang.sch.id/
